76204.「……ぷるぷる。ここはね。\n エテーネって村だったらしいよ。\n<br>\n「:
Plump. This is the place. I heard it used to be a village called Ethene. But it was destroyed by an angry god
because it disobeyed him a long time ago. It's scary, isn't it? It's so soft. That's why there's no one here
anymore. But a little while ago, a beautiful woman and her grandfather passed by here.

76215.「……ぷるぷる。ここはね。\n エテーネって村だったらしいよ。\n<br>\n「:
Plump. This is the place. I heard it used to be a village called Ethene. But it was destroyed by an angry god
because it disobeyed him a long time ago. It's scary, isn't it? It's so scary.

78270.「……ふう。ひと休み ひと休み。\n<br>\n「あちこち 旅をしているけど こ:
Phew. A rest. A rest. I've traveled here and there, but I didn't know there was a village like this. Did you
know?

78271.「だよねー。こんな ヘンピな所に\n 村があるなんて 誰も思わないよね。:
I know, right? No one would think that
there would be a village in such a
strange place.

78272.「知ってたの？ キミは 物知りなんだね。\n ふーん。エテーネって村だったのか。:
You knew? You know a lot of things, don't you? Hmmm...Ethene was a village? I wonder what kind of people
lived there.

78274.「北の空に浮かぶ 巨大な渦を\n お前さんは 見たじゃろうか？\n<br>\n「:
Did you see that giant whirlpool in the northern sky? It's called the Creatorium. I don't know the details,
but it's been floating in the sky like that since before the world began.
